name: Hippie Heart Necklace
description:
A unique Valentine Necklace. . . Two toned buoy heart. A little 'Yin and Yang', With 6mm Indian Agate beads, which give it a very 'free spirit' appeal.
This piece of buoy was a rare find so definitely a 'one true heart'.
It is a longer length necklace with each bead incorporated into the knot work using 0.5mm camo coloured hemp. With a piece of  the two toned buoy that was cut from the heart shape as a matching clasp button. The heart also has sterling silver grommets giving the holes a beautiful finish.
The Heart Pendant measures approx - 9 cms x 9 cms (3.5 x 3.5 inches) at widest parts.
60 x 6mm Indian Agate beads
Necklace length approx - 33.5 cms to the top of the heart.

name: Mottled Buoy Turtle Necklace
description:
This beautiful turtle has been cut from a piece of mottled yellow fishermans buoy, picked up from the Cornish shoreline. It has been worked on, by hand, carefully shaped and the surface brought to a smooth shiny finish.  A very unique pendant that has been attached with sterling silver findings onto a brown rubber thong that has been finished with Sterling silver cord ends and lobster clasp.

Approximate measurements of pendant are 7.5 cms x 6.5 cms.

Necklace length is approximately 45.5 cms (18 inches).

name: Yachts Knots Hemp Bracelet
description:
Mens or womens knotted hemp bracelet displaying a marine blue chunky unpolished piece of sea glass,  found on the Cornish shoreline.  A unique bracelet for the surfer, sailor or beachcomber

It has a tied clasp and will fit a wrist measurement between 14 cms and 19 cms (5.5 inches - 7.5 inches)

Sea Glass size - approx 3.5 cms X 2.5 cm and approx 7 mm thick
 
Natural hemp

name: Beach Buoy Surfers Bracelet Orange
description:
Mens or womens knotted hemp bracelet displaying a recycled bead sculpted from a piece of orange fishermans buoy, and a small brown sea glass clasp, both found on the Cornish shoreline. The bead has been shaped and polished by hand.  A unique bracelet for the surfer or beachcomber.

Bracelet length - 20 cms (8 inches)

Bead size - approximately 2.5 cms length, 4 cms circumference
 
Sea glass clasp size - 1 cm x 1 cm

Natural hemp

name: My a'th kar Necklace
description:
My a'th kar (I love you in Cornish). A beautiful piece of Cornish fishermans buoy, hand shaped into a heart. Perfect for a Valentines gift or just for a unique gift for youself or someone special.  A piece of fishing treasure close to your heart.
Sterling Silver findings finish off the heart and natural bleached hemp knotted with fine multi coloured wooden beads. Hand crafted buoy clasp and cord ends.  An individual piece just for you.

Approximate measurements of heart are 6cm x 5.5cm.

Overall necklace length including width of the heart is approximately 22".
